Diagnostics Commands

This APIs can be referred here. All these APIs are returning BsonDocument so check the Mongo documentation.

Beware: These APIs are not tested.

All APIs are async.

__ here

Imports

../core/bson, ../core/types, ../core/utils, ../core/wire
